detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_gc_clean_entry: cleans a entry in the cache_inode.
cleans an entry in the cache_inode.
cache_inode_gc_invalidate_related_dirent: sets the related directory entries as invalid.
sets the related directory entries as invalid. /!\ the parent entry is supposed to be locked.
cache_inode_gc_suppress_file: suppress a file entry from the cache inode.
Suppress a file entry from the cache inode.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] pointer to the entry to be suppressed.

simplesect.para: LRU_LIST_SET_INVALID if entry is successfully suppressed, LRU_LIST_DO_NOT_SET_INVALID otherwise

detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_gc_suppress_directory: suppress a directory entry from the cache inode.
Suppress a file entry from the cache inode.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] pointer to the entry to be suppressed.

simplesect.para: 1 if entry is successfully suppressed, 0 otherwise

detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_gc_function: Tests is an entry in cache inode is to be set invalid (has expired).
Tests is an entry in cache inode is to be set invalid (has expired). If entry is invalidated, does the cleaning stuff on it.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] pointer to the entry to test

simplesect.para: 1 if entry must be set invalid, 0 if not.

detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_set_gc_policy: Set the cache_inode garbagge collecting policy.
cache_inode_get_gc_policy: Set the cache_inode garbagge collecting policy.
cache_inode_gc: Perform garbbage collection on the ressources managed by a client.
Perform garbbage collection on the ressources managed by a client.

parameterdescription.para: [INOUT] the hashtable used to stored the cache_inode entries.
[INOUT] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management.

simplesect.para: CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS if operation is a success
CACHE_INODE_LRU_ERROR if allocation error occured when validating the entry

briefdescription.para: Do garbagge collection on a cache inode client.

detaileddescription.para:
Author
deniel
Date
2005/12/20 10:51:49
Revision
1.21 cache_inode_gc.c: do garbagge collection on a cache inode client.
